bibl.title: Bemerkungen zu verschiedenen Papyri.
bibl.note: Suite de: James M.S. COWEY, ZPE 84 (1990) pp. 75-78; Martina RICHTER, ZPE 86 (1991) pp. 251-258; Renate ZIEGLER, ZPE 91 (1992) pp. 91-94. - 34 corrections mineures, concernant la conversion de dates.
